idea-plugin.name: BGT
idea-plugin.description:
Better GitHub Theme (BGT) offers a beautifully crafted, modern theme for IntelliJ IDEA that elevates your coding experience. Tailored for developers who appreciate a sleek and stylish interface, this theme features:
  • Dark Mode: A comfortable, low-light environment to reduce eye strain during long coding sessions.
  • Custom Color Scheme: A carefully designed color palette that enhances syntax highlighting, with support for italicized text for improved readability.
  • GitHub-Inspired Design: Aesthetic elements inspired by GitHub's dark mode, providing a familiar feel for users.

Why Choose BGT?
Enjoy a clear, focused design that promotes productivity and makes your coding environment not just functional, but enjoyable. Perfect for developers who thrive in dark themes and seek a visually appealing workspace.
